about.title: About Verscienta Health
about.subtitle: Bridging ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to empower informed health decisions

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Verscienta Health is dedicated to making herbal medicine knowledge accessible, evidence-based, and trustworthy. We believe that traditional healing wisdom, when combined with modern scientific research, can provide powerful tools for health and wellness.
mission.paragraph2: Our platform serves as a comprehensive resource for anyone interested in herbal medicine—from curious beginners to experienced practitioners. We carefully curate information from both ancient texts and contemporary research to provide you with the most complete picture possible.

evidenceBased.title: Evidence-Based
evidenceBased.description: We ground our information in both traditional wisdom and modern scientific research, providing citations and references for all claims.

holistic.title: Holistic Approach
holistic.description: We honor the interconnectedness of body, mind, and spirit, integrating wisdom from multiple healing traditions.

educational.title: Educational Focus
educational.description: We empower users through education, helping you make informed decisions about your health and wellness journey.

community.title: Community-Driven
community.description: We foster a community of practitioners, researchers, and enthusiasts working together to advance herbal medicine knowledge.

herbDatabase.title: Comprehensive Herb Database
herbDatabase.description: Detailed profiles of hundreds of medicinal herbs, including botanical information, traditional uses, active constituents, dosage guidelines, and safety information.

formulas.title: Traditional Formulas
formulas.description: Time-tested herbal formulas from Traditional Chinese Medicine, Ayurveda, and Western herbalism, with ingredient breakdowns and usage guidelines.

symptomChecker.title: AI-Powered Symptom Checker
symptomChecker.description: Get personalized herbal recommendations based on your symptoms, analyzed from both Western and Traditional Chinese Medicine perspectives.

practitionerDirectory.title: Practitioner Directory
practitionerDirectory.description: Find qualified herbalists, acupuncturists, and holistic health practitioners in your area.

cta.title: Get in Touch
cta.description: Have questions, suggestions, or want to contribute to our platform? We'd love to hear from you.
